channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Reencle Prime Review: A Sustainable Solution for Making Compost
item.description: This electric home composter turns kitchen scraps into valuable compost—if you’re willing to put up with some fuss.

item.title: Hero’s all-in-one, AI productivity app takes on Google’s Calendar and others
item.description: People often use multiple apps for notes, schedule management, and to-dos. But why not combine them all in one app? That’s the ethos behind Hero, an a...

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Secure your ticket at this year’s lowest rates
item.description: Missed the 2-for-1 deal for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025? No problem! Super Early Bird prices are still available, with savings of up to $1,130 on individu...

item.title: 9 Best Digital Notebooks, Tablets, and Smart Pens (2025)
item.description: These nifty tools combine the ease of jotting notes by hand with the power of saving them digitally.

item.title: OpenAI’s new trademark application hints at humanoid robots, smart jewelry, and more
item.description: Last Friday, AI startup OpenAI filed a new application to trademark products associated with its brand — “OpenAI” — with the U.S. Patent and Trademark...

item.title: The Best Hearing Aids of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested and audiologist-approved devices will help you hear sounds more clearly. Never miss out on a dinner conversation again.

item.title: 13 Best Cheap Mattresses, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These Are Our Favorite WIRED-Tested Mattresses You Can Buy Online for $1,000 or Less.

item.title: What PowerSchool won’t say about its data breach affecting millions of students
item.description: The hack has the potential to be one of the biggest of the year, but the edtech giant is refusing to answer important questions © 2024 TechCrunch. All...

item.title: The Beatles won a Grammy last night, thanks to AI
item.description: The Beatles’ AI-assisted track “Now and Then” won the Grammy for Best Rock Performance on Sunday night, marking the first time that a song of its kind...

item.title: Elektron Digitone II Review: Worthy Successor to a Classic
item.description: Double the polyphony, quadruple the tracks, and three new synth engines make this a worthy successor.
